title: 有关HMCL启动器的问题
author: 永远多远
txt_content:
啧，自从把启动器的版本更到2.5之后就成这样了。。
：[21:27:33] [main/INFO] Prepared background image in bgskin folder.
[21:28:00] [AWT-EventQueue-0/INFO] Start generating launching command...
[21:28:00] [Game Launcher/INFO] Building process
[21:28:00] [Game Launcher/INFO] Logging in...
[21:28:00] [Game Launcher/INFO] Detecting libraries...
[21:28:00] [Game Launcher/ERROR] 
---- Hello Minecraft! Crash Report ----
  Version: 2.5.0.65
  Time: 2016-07-11 21:28:00
  Thread: Thread[Game Launcher,6,main]

  Content: 
    java.lang.NullPointerException

    at org.jackhuang.hellominecraft.launcher.core.version.MinecraftLibrary.getDownloadInfo(MinecraftLibrary.java:142)

    at org.jackhuang.hellominecraft.launcher.core.download.MinecraftDownloadService.getDownloadLibraries(MinecraftDownloadService.java:60)

    at org.jackhuang.hellominecraft.launcher.core.launch.GameLauncher.makeLaunchCommand(GameLauncher.java:102)

    at org.jackhuang.hellominecraft.launcher.util.HMCLGameLauncher$1.run(HMCLGameLauncher.java:88)



-- System Details --
  Operating System: Windows 10 (x86), 10.0
  Java Version: 1.8.0_92, Oracle Corporation
  Java VM Version: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (mixed mode), Oracle Corporation
求大触解答。。。{:10_514:}

replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content:
又是HMCL抽风。不要使用新版HMCL。
解决步骤：
1.下载旧版的HMCL，并把新版覆盖。
2.系统盘全盘搜索".HMCL"文件夹，搜到后，文件夹直接删。
3.没解决的话换个启动器

replies.author: 企业123
replies.txt_content:
该启动器被卖之后重新了不少新bug呢
解决方案:
1.貌似使用最新的forge即可解决
2.使用其他玩家制作的不自动更新的旧版

replies.author: 企业123
replies.txt_content:
企业123 发表于 2016-7-12 01:23
该启动器被卖之后重新了不少新bug呢
解决方案:
1.貌似使用最新的forge即可解决
第2条补上连接https://github.com/Cat7373/HMCL/releases
我更新到2.5.1就不会这样了
